name: threads-clone-backend
description: Backend services for Threads Clone App

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:services && npm run install:gateway && npm run install:shared
scripts.install:services: npm run install:auth && npm run install:chat && npm run install:notification && npm run install:post
scripts.start:services: concurrently "npm run start:auth" "npm run start:chat" "npm run start:notification" "npm run start:post"
scripts.dev:services: concurrently "npm run dev:auth" "npm run dev:chat" "npm run dev:notification" "npm run dev:post"
scripts.lint: npm run lint:services && npm run lint:gateway && npm run lint:shared
scripts.lint:services: concurrently "npm run lint:auth" "npm run lint:chat" "npm run lint:notification" "npm run lint:post"
